channel.title: Photoperiod Response on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Photoperiod Response on funPlantGenes

item.title: CmCIB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmCIB1 Gene Name: CRYPTOCHROME-INTERACTING bHLH1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The GA-receptor CmGID1B plays an important role in integrating photoperiod information from the CmCIB1-PHR2 complex and plant age from the cmo-miR156-CmSPL3 module to coordinate endogenous GA levels and signal perception.

item.title: CmGID1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmGID1B Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: GmGBP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01G008600.1 Gene Symbol: GmGBP1 Gene Name: Glycine max GAMYB-binding protein gene Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Natural variation in GmGBP1 promoter affects photoperiod control of flowering time and maturity in soybean.

item.title: GmRAV
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G204400 Gene Symbol: GmRAV Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We identified six polymorphisms in the GmRAV promoter that showed significant association with flowering time and maturity of soybean in one or multiple environments.

item.title: HvCO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvCO1 Gene Name: CONSTANS-like protein1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvCO1, the closest barley ortholog of the key photoperiod response gene CONSTANS in Arabidopsis, was over-expressed in the spring barley Golden Promise.

item.title: HvFT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvFT3|PPDH2 Gene Name: FT-like protein 3 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of vernalization and day-length response genes in barley (Hordeum vulgare L.

item.title: phyB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: phyB1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We report that SlphyF acts as a red/far-red light reversible low fluence sensor, likely through the formation of heterodimers with SlphyB1 and SlphyB2.

item.title: PHYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PHYB2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We report that SlphyF acts as a red/far-red light reversible low fluence sensor, likely through the formation of heterodimers with SlphyB1 and SlPHYB2.

item.title: PPD-B1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCSU02G196100 Gene Symbol: PPD-B1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: Ppd-D1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Ppd-D1 Gene Name: pseudo-response regulator Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Ppd-D1 is one of the most potent genes affecting the photoperiod response of wheat (Triticum aestivum).

item.title: PtPHOR1_1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: POPTR_0007s03730 Gene Symbol: PtPHOR1_1 Gene Name: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 Genome: Species: Populus tremula x Populus alba Functional Descriptions: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 (PHOR1)-like Genes Regulate Shoot/root Growth, Starch Accumulation, and Wood Formation in Populus.

item.title: PtPHOR1_2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: POPTR_0005s05880 Gene Symbol: PtPHOR1_2 Gene Name: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 Genome: Species: Populus tremula x Populus alba Functional Descriptions: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 (PHOR1)-like Genes Regulate Shoot/root Growth, Starch Accumulation, and Wood Formation in Populus.

item.title: SiPHYC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Seita.9G089700 Gene Symbol: SiPHYC Gene Name: PHYTOCHROME C Genome: Species: Setaria italica Functional Descriptions: Here, genomic variations of PHYTOCHROME C (PHYC) between wild and cultivated Setaria gene pools were analysed and three SiPHYC mutants were identified.

item.title: StBEL5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StBEL5 Gene Name: BEL1-related homeotic protein 5 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The level of StBEL5 mRNA increased in response to a short-day photoperiod in both leaves and stolons.
